author: Reuters
title: Lululemon apologizes after employee offends by promoting ‘bat fried rice’ T-shirt
description: The T-shirt showing a Chinese takeout box with bat wings riled critics who said it trying to stir anti-Asian sentiment during the coronavirus pandemic
content:
HONG KONG — U.S. exercise apparel brand Lululemon issued statements on Tuesday apologizing for, and distancing itself from, a T-shirt design promoted by one of its art directors that triggered outrage and accusations of racism online.
